item.description:
Happy New Year Everyone!
Please join us for an evening of fun and games and vegan potluck.

For games, we already have Pente, Tri-ominos, Trivial Pursuit, Apples to Apples, Cranium and lots more. Bring your favorite if it’s not listed here.

For the potluck, there be some snacks provided but feel free to bring more tasty snacks, light appetizers or finger food.

BYOB!

Should be fun!

Sorry to send this so last minute. I’m still on “holiday time”.
item.name: Game Night and Vegan Potluck
